member.name: IWICPixelFormatInfo2.GetNumericRepresentation
member.summary: Retrieves the of the pixel format.
member.param: The address of a variable that you've defined. On successful completion, the function sets your variable to the WICPixelFormatNumericRepresentation of the pixel format.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICPixelFormatInfo2.SupportsTransparency
member.summary: Returns whether the format supports transparent pixels.
member.param: Returns TRUE if the pixel format supports transparency; otherwise, FALSE.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICPixelFormatInfo2
member.summary: Extends by providing additional information about a pixel format.
